rules.name: myRule_1
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND NOT (4) AND NOT(5) AND NOT(6) AND 7 AND NOT(8) AND NOT (9) AND NOT (10)

rightValue.stringValue: Thank you for reaching out to Intapp Support. Your case #
An engineer has been assigned to your support case, and will be in touch:
Thank you for reaching out to Intapp Support. Your case has been assigned to a Support Engineer. They will contact you as soon as possible.

rules.label: Waiting on Customer

rules.name: myRule_4
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND NOT (2) AND 3 AND NOT(4) AND 5 AND NOT(6) AND NOT (7) AND 8 AND NOT(9) AND NOT(10) AND NOT (11)

rightValue.stringValue: Thank you for reaching out to Intapp Support. Your case #
An engineer has been assigned to your support case, and will be in touch:
Thank you for reaching out to Intapp Support. Your case has been assigned to a Support Engineer. They will contact you as soon as possible.

rules.label: Run Flow Waiting on Customer no email

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.conditionLogic: NOT (1) AND 2 AND 3 AND NOT(4) AND NOT(5) AND NOT(6) AND 7 AND NOT (8) AND NOT (9) AND NOT (10)

rightValue.stringValue: Support Case ReceivedYour case number is:
An engineer has been assigned to your support case, and will be in touch:
Thank you for reaching out to Intapp Support. Your case has been assigned to a Support Engineer. They will contact you as soon as possible.

rules.label: In Process

Flow.description: Any time the last communication came from an Engineer at Intapp, through either the New Comment, Case Comments, or from a related Email where the senders domain is intapp.com, the status should be "Waiting on Customer". However, if the last Comment was created by the customer, or the last related email came from a sender not from the domain intapp.com, then the status should be "In Process".
Flow.label: Update case Status from comment
